titleStmt.title: A discourse touching the doctrine of doubting In which not onely the principall arguments, that our popish aduersaries vse, for the establishing of that discomfortable opinion, are plainely and truely aunswered: but also sundrie suggestions of Sathan tending to the maintenance of that in the mindes of the faithfull fully satisfied, and that with singuler comfort also. VVritten long since by T.W. and now published for the profit of the people of God.
titleStmt.author: T. W. (Thomas Wilcox), 1549?-1608.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Legat, printer to the Vuniversitie of Cambridge,

notesStmt.note: John Legat worked as a printer in Cambridge and London 1620-1658.
Pages 106-95 misnumbered 105-94; 248-53 printed out of order.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
